name: ConditionalAutoPlacement
desc: The object for defining conditional properties for an automatically placed component, and when the conditional properties are in effect.

items.name: conditions
items.desc: An instance or array of conditions that, when met, cause the conditional automatic placement properties to take effect.

items.name: enabled
items.desc: A Boolean that defines whether placement of advertisements is enabled.

items.name: layout
items.desc: A value that defines the layout properties for the automatically inserted components.
